typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	test-folder as string,
	test-file as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'json',
	folderPath: ($test-folder),
	fileName: ($test-file),
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> CreatedDataset
CreatedDataset assert(expectTrue(ERROR_FUNCTION(''), false, 'assert1')) ~> Assert1
